colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES ZA BYED RDO RJE MKHA' @010A *, ,'GRO'I SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL SDIG MUN SEL BA'I TSA ZER ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG DAM PA DPON MO YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO NAS LHA RDZAS SKYES DANG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN SOGS SKYES CHEN DU MA'I CHO GA MDOR BSDUS TE BZHUGS PA RNAMS SU DMIGS RNAM GO SLA BA DANG KHRID RGYUN LA YOD PAR DGONGS PAS GSAL BAR BKOD SNANG MA MDZAD LA, AA KHU RIN PO CHE SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM DU DE'I KHRID KYI ZIN BRIS YOD PAS DE DAG LAS LHAG KHYAD 'DON RGYU 'DIR MED MOD, BLA DMAN RANG MNYAM 'GA' LA PHAN PA CUNG ZAD YOD SRID SNYAM PA'I SGO NAS, CHO GA'I RIM PA DMIGS RNAM DANG BCAS PA GSAL BAR ^SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS MI DBANG NYID KYI GUR SGANG STENG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,) TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CANG JUN, ,SE CHEN JUN WANG TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, ,GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG THOB, ,DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
